All About History - Book Of Great Explorers 2015

When the Romans printed the first world map 2,000 years ago, little did they know that half of it was missing. It wasnâ€™t until a handful of brave explorers dared to set sail across those never-ending oceans that we came to discover the New World. Here we delve deeper into the fascinating history of exploration, from Antarctic treks to space travel.
